name: Event Horizon - NGC 6251
description: Event Horizon - NGC 6251, scanned acrylic painting on a translucent green vinyl record. Created by Sam Stevens (Dreams Lost In Time). Part of the on-going series, "Event Horizon". The concept of the Event Horizon series is to reimagine what energy could look like as it crosses the event horizon of a black hole, in some distance galaxy throughout the infinite universe. This painting depicts my vision of light crossing the event horizon of the black hole, NGC 6251.
